body: DROP KEYSPACE test_keyspace;

-- change keyspace name
CREATE KEYSPACE system
	WITH REPLICATION = {
		'class': 'org.apache.cassandra.locator.LocalStrategy'
	}
	AND DURABLE_WRITES = true;

/*
################################################
################### TYPES ######################
################################################
*/

/*
################################################
################# FUNCTIONS ####################
################################################
*/

/*
################################################
################# AGGREGATES ###################
################################################
*/

/*
################################################
################### TABLES #####################
################################################
*/
CREATE TABLE system."IndexInfo" (
	index_name text,
	table_name text,
	value empty,
	PRIMARY KEY(table_name, index_name)
) WITH 	dclocal_read_repair_chance = 0 AND 
	gc_grace_seconds = 0 AND 
	bloom_filter_fp_chance = 0.01 AND 
	caching = { 'keys': 'ALL', 'rows_per_partition': 'NONE' } AND 
	comment = 'built column indexes' AND 
	compaction = { 'class': 'org.apache.cassandra.db.compaction.SizeTieredCompactionStrategy', 'max_threshold': '32', 'min_threshold': '4' } AND 
	compression = { 'chunk_length_in_kb': '64', 'class': 'org.apache.cassandra.io.compress.LZ4Compressor' } AND 
	default_time_to_live = 0 AND 
	speculative_retry = '99PERCENTILE' AND 
	min_index_interval = 128 AND 
	max_index_interval = 2048 AND 
	crc_check_chance = 1;

CREATE TABLE system.available_ranges (
	keyspace_name text,
	ranges set<blob>,
	PRIMARY KEY(keyspace_name)
) WITH 	dclocal_read_repair_chance = 0 AND 
	gc_grace_seconds = 0 AND 
	bloom_filter_fp_chance = 0.01 AND 
	caching = { 'keys': 'ALL', 'rows_per_partition': 'NONE' } AND 
	comment = 'available keyspace/ranges during bootstrap/replace that are ready to be served' AND 
	compaction = { 'class': 'org.apache.cassandra.db.compaction.SizeTieredCompactionStrategy', 'max_threshold': '32', 'min_threshold': '4' } AND 
	compression = { 'chunk_length_in_kb': '64', 'class': 'org.apache.cassandra.io.compress.LZ4Compressor' } AND 
	default_time_to_live = 0 AND 
	speculative_retry = '99PERCENTILE' AND 
	min_index_interval = 128 AND 
	max_index_interval = 2048 AND 
	crc_check_chance = 1;

CREATE TABLE system.batches (
	id timeuuid,
	mutations list<blob>,
	version int,
	PRIMARY KEY(id)
) WITH 	dclocal_read_repair_chance = 0 AND 
	gc_grace_seconds = 0 AND 
	bloom_filter_fp_chance = 0.01 AND 
	caching = { 'keys': 'ALL', 'rows_per_partition': 'NONE' } AND 
	comment = 'batches awaiting replay' AND 
	compaction = { 'class': 'org.apache.cassandra.db.compaction.SizeTieredCompactionStrategy', 'max_threshold': '32', 'min_threshold': '2' } AND 
	compression = { 'chunk_length_in_kb': '64', 'class': 'org.apache.cassandra.io.compress.LZ4Compressor' } AND 
	default_time_to_live = 0 AND 
	speculative_retry = '99PERCENTILE' AND 
	min_index_interval = 128 AND 
	max_index_interval = 2048 AND 
	crc_check_chance = 1;

CREATE TABLE system.batchlog (
	data blob,
	id uuid,
	version int,
	written_at timestamp,
	PRIMARY KEY(id)
) WITH 	dclocal_read_repair_chance = 0 AND 
	gc_grace_seconds = 0 AND 
	bloom_filter_fp_chance = 0.01 AND 
	caching = { 'keys': 'ALL', 'rows_per_partition': 'NONE' } AND 
	comment = '*DEPRECATED* batchlog entries' AND 
	compaction = { 'class': 'org.apache.cassandra.db.compaction.SizeTieredCompactionStrategy', 'max_threshold': '32', 'min_threshold': '2' } AND 
	compression = { 'chunk_length_in_kb': '64', 'class': 'org.apache.cassandra.io.compress.LZ4Compressor' } AND 
	default_time_to_live = 0 AND 
	speculative_retry = '99PERCENTILE' AND 
	min_index_interval = 128 AND 
	max_index_interval = 2048 AND 
	crc_check_chance = 1;

CREATE TABLE system.built_views (
	keyspace_name text,
	status_replicated boolean,
	view_name text,
	PRIMARY KEY(keyspace_name, view_name)
) WITH 	dclocal_read_repair_chance = 0 AND 
	gc_grace_seconds = 0 AND 
	bloom_filter_fp_chance = 0.01 AND 
	caching = { 'keys': 'ALL', 'rows_per_partition': 'NONE' } AND 
	comment = 'built views' AND 
	compaction = { 'class': 'org.apache.cassandra.db.compaction.SizeTieredCompactionStrategy', 'max_threshold': '32', 'min_threshold': '4' } AND 
	compression = { 'chunk_length_in_kb': '64', 'class': 'org.apache.cassandra.io.compress.LZ4Compressor' } AND 
	default_time_to_live = 0 AND 
	speculative_retry = '99PERCENTILE' AND 
	min_index_interval = 128 AND 
	max_index_interval = 2048 AND 
	crc_check_chance = 1;

CREATE TABLE system.compaction_history (
	bytes_in bigint,
	bytes_out bigint,
	columnfamily_name text,
	compacted_at timestamp,
	id uuid,
	keyspace_name text,
	rows_merged map<int, bigint>,
	PRIMARY KEY(id)
) WITH 	dclocal_read_repair_chance = 0 AND 
	gc_grace_seconds = 0 AND 
	bloom_filter_fp_chance = 0.01 AND 
	caching = { 'keys': 'ALL', 'rows_per_partition': 'NONE' } AND 
	comment = 'week-long compaction history' AND 
	compaction = { 'class': 'org.apache.cassandra.db.compaction.SizeTieredCompactionStrategy', 'max_threshold': '32', 'min_threshold': '4' } AND 
	compression = { 'chunk_length_in_kb': '64', 'class': 'org.apache.cassandra.io.compress.LZ4Compressor' } AND 
	default_time_to_live = 604800 AND 
	speculative_retry = '99PERCENTILE' AND 
	min_index_interval = 128 AND 
	max_index_interval = 2048 AND 
	crc_check_chance = 1;

CREATE TABLE system.hints (
	hint_id timeuuid,
	message_version int,
	mutation blob,
	target_id uuid,
	PRIMARY KEY(target_id, hint_id, message_version)
) WITH 	dclocal_read_repair_chance = 0 AND 
	gc_grace_seconds = 0 AND 
	bloom_filter_fp_chance = 0.01 AND 
	caching = { 'keys': 'ALL', 'rows_per_partition': 'NONE' } AND 
	comment = '*DEPRECATED* hints awaiting delivery' AND 
	compaction = { 'class': 'org.apache.cassandra.db.compaction.SizeTieredCompactionStrategy', 'enabled': 'false', 'max_threshold': '32', 'min_threshold': '4' } AND 
	compression = { 'chunk_length_in_kb': '64', 'class': 'org.apache.cassandra.io.compress.LZ4Compressor' } AND 
	default_time_to_live = 0 AND 
	speculative_retry = '99PERCENTILE' AND 
	min_index_interval = 128 AND 
	max_index_interval = 2048 AND 
	crc_check_chance = 1;

CREATE TABLE system.local (
	bootstrapped text,
	broadcast_address inet,
	cluster_name text,
	cql_version text,
	data_center text,
	gossip_generation int,
	host_id uuid,
	key text,
	listen_address inet,
	native_protocol_version text,
	partitioner text,
	rack text,
	release_version text,
	rpc_address inet,
	schema_version uuid,
	thrift_version text,
	tokens set<text>,
	truncated_at map<uuid, blob>,
	PRIMARY KEY(key)
) WITH 	dclocal_read_repair_chance = 0 AND 
	gc_grace_seconds = 0 AND 
	bloom_filter_fp_chance = 0.01 AND 
	caching = { 'keys': 'ALL', 'rows_per_partition': 'NONE' } AND 
	comment = 'information about the local node' AND 
	compaction = { 'class': 'org.apache.cassandra.db.compaction.SizeTieredCompactionStrategy', 'max_threshold': '32', 'min_threshold': '4' } AND 
	compression = { 'chunk_length_in_kb': '64', 'class': 'org.apache.cassandra.io.compress.LZ4Compressor' } AND 
	default_time_to_live = 0 AND 
	speculative_retry = '99PERCENTILE' AND 
	min_index_interval = 128 AND 
	max_index_interval = 2048 AND 
	crc_check_chance = 1;

CREATE TABLE system.paxos (
	cf_id uuid,
	in_progress_ballot timeuuid,
	most_recent_commit blob,
	most_recent_commit_at timeuuid,
	most_recent_commit_version int,
	proposal blob,
	proposal_ballot timeuuid,
	proposal_version int,
	row_key blob,
	PRIMARY KEY(row_key, cf_id)
) WITH 	dclocal_read_repair_chance = 0 AND 
	gc_grace_seconds = 0 AND 
	bloom_filter_fp_chance = 0.01 AND 
	caching = { 'keys': 'ALL', 'rows_per_partition': 'NONE' } AND 
	comment = 'in-progress paxos proposals' AND 
	compaction = { 'class': 'org.apache.cassandra.db.compaction.LeveledCompactionStrategy' } AND 
	compression = { 'chunk_length_in_kb': '64', 'class': 'org.apache.cassandra.io.compress.LZ4Compressor' } AND 
	default_time_to_live = 0 AND 
	speculative_retry = '99PERCENTILE' AND 
	min_index_interval = 128 AND 
	max_index_interval = 2048 AND 
	crc_check_chance = 1;

CREATE TABLE system.peer_events (
	hints_dropped map<uuid, int>,
	peer inet,
	PRIMARY KEY(peer)
) WITH 	dclocal_read_repair_chance = 0 AND 
	gc_grace_seconds = 0 AND 
	bloom_filter_fp_chance = 0.01 AND 
	caching = { 'keys': 'ALL', 'rows_per_partition': 'NONE' } AND 
	comment = 'events related to peers' AND 
	compaction = { 'class': 'org.apache.cassandra.db.compaction.SizeTieredCompactionStrategy', 'max_threshold': '32', 'min_threshold': '4' } AND 
	compression = { 'chunk_length_in_kb': '64', 'class': 'org.apache.cassandra.io.compress.LZ4Compressor' } AND 
	default_time_to_live = 0 AND 
	speculative_retry = '99PERCENTILE' AND 
	min_index_interval = 128 AND 
	max_index_interval = 2048 AND 
	crc_check_chance = 1;

CREATE TABLE system.peers (
	data_center text,
	host_id uuid,
	peer inet,
	preferred_ip inet,
	rack text,
	release_version text,
	rpc_address inet,
	schema_version uuid,
	tokens set<text>,
	PRIMARY KEY(peer)
) WITH 	dclocal_read_repair_chance = 0 AND 
	gc_grace_seconds = 0 AND 
	bloom_filter_fp_chance = 0.01 AND 
	caching = { 'keys': 'ALL', 'rows_per_partition': 'NONE' } AND 
	comment = 'information about known peers in the cluster' AND 
	compaction = { 'class': 'org.apache.cassandra.db.compaction.SizeTieredCompactionStrategy', 'max_threshold': '32', 'min_threshold': '4' } AND 
	compression = { 'chunk_length_in_kb': '64', 'class': 'org.apache.cassandra.io.compress.LZ4Compressor' } AND 
	default_time_to_live = 0 AND 
	speculative_retry = '99PERCENTILE' AND 
	min_index_interval = 128 AND 
	max_index_interval = 2048 AND 
	crc_check_chance = 1;

CREATE TABLE system.prepared_statements (
	logged_keyspace text,
	prepared_id blob,
	query_string text,
	PRIMARY KEY(prepared_id)
) WITH 	dclocal_read_repair_chance = 0 AND 
	gc_grace_seconds = 0 AND 
	bloom_filter_fp_chance = 0.01 AND 
	caching = { 'keys': 'ALL', 'rows_per_partition': 'NONE' } AND 
	comment = 'prepared statements' AND 
	compaction = { 'class': 'org.apache.cassandra.db.compaction.SizeTieredCompactionStrategy', 'max_threshold': '32', 'min_threshold': '4' } AND 
	compression = { 'chunk_length_in_kb': '64', 'class': 'org.apache.cassandra.io.compress.LZ4Compressor' } AND 
	default_time_to_live = 0 AND 
	speculative_retry = '99PERCENTILE' AND 
	min_index_interval = 128 AND 
	max_index_interval = 2048 AND 
	crc_check_chance = 1;

CREATE TABLE system.range_xfers (
	requested_at timestamp,
	token_bytes blob,
	PRIMARY KEY(token_bytes)
) WITH 	dclocal_read_repair_chance = 0 AND 
	gc_grace_seconds = 0 AND 
	bloom_filter_fp_chance = 0.01 AND 
	caching = { 'keys': 'ALL', 'rows_per_partition': 'NONE' } AND 
	comment = 'ranges requested for transfer' AND 
	compaction = { 'class': 'org.apache.cassandra.db.compaction.SizeTieredCompactionStrategy', 'max_threshold': '32', 'min_threshold': '4' } AND 
	compression = { 'chunk_length_in_kb': '64', 'class': 'org.apache.cassandra.io.compress.LZ4Compressor' } AND 
	default_time_to_live = 0 AND 
	speculative_retry = '99PERCENTILE' AND 
	min_index_interval = 128 AND 
	max_index_interval = 2048 AND 
	crc_check_chance = 1;

CREATE TABLE system.size_estimates (
	keyspace_name text,
	mean_partition_size bigint,
	partitions_count bigint,
	range_end text,
	range_start text,
	table_name text,
	PRIMARY KEY(keyspace_name, table_name, range_start, range_end)
) WITH 	dclocal_read_repair_chance = 0 AND 
	gc_grace_seconds = 0 AND 
	bloom_filter_fp_chance = 0.01 AND 
	caching = { 'keys': 'ALL', 'rows_per_partition': 'NONE' } AND 
	comment = 'per-table primary range size estimates' AND 
	compaction = { 'class': 'org.apache.cassandra.db.compaction.SizeTieredCompactionStrategy', 'max_threshold': '32', 'min_threshold': '4' } AND 
	compression = { 'chunk_length_in_kb': '64', 'class': 'org.apache.cassandra.io.compress.LZ4Compressor' } AND 
	default_time_to_live = 0 AND 
	speculative_retry = '99PERCENTILE' AND 
	min_index_interval = 128 AND 
	max_index_interval = 2048 AND 
	crc_check_chance = 1;

CREATE TABLE system.sstable_activity (
	columnfamily_name text,
	generation int,
	keyspace_name text,
	rate_120m double,
	rate_15m double,
	PRIMARY KEY((keyspace_name, columnfamily_name, generation))
) WITH 	dclocal_read_repair_chance = 0 AND 
	gc_grace_seconds = 0 AND 
	bloom_filter_fp_chance = 0.01 AND 
	caching = { 'keys': 'ALL', 'rows_per_partition': 'NONE' } AND 
	comment = 'historic sstable read rates' AND 
	compaction = { 'class': 'org.apache.cassandra.db.compaction.SizeTieredCompactionStrategy', 'max_threshold': '32', 'min_threshold': '4' } AND 
	compression = { 'chunk_length_in_kb': '64', 'class': 'org.apache.cassandra.io.compress.LZ4Compressor' } AND 
	default_time_to_live = 0 AND 
	speculative_retry = '99PERCENTILE' AND 
	min_index_interval = 128 AND 
	max_index_interval = 2048 AND 
	crc_check_chance = 1;

CREATE TABLE system.transferred_ranges (
	keyspace_name text,
	operation text,
	peer inet,
	ranges set<blob>,
	PRIMARY KEY((operation, keyspace_name), peer)
) WITH 	dclocal_read_repair_chance = 0 AND 
	gc_grace_seconds = 0 AND 
	bloom_filter_fp_chance = 0.01 AND 
	caching = { 'keys': 'ALL', 'rows_per_partition': 'NONE' } AND 
	comment = 'record of transferred ranges for streaming operation' AND 
	compaction = { 'class': 'org.apache.cassandra.db.compaction.SizeTieredCompactionStrategy', 'max_threshold': '32', 'min_threshold': '4' } AND 
	compression = { 'chunk_length_in_kb': '64', 'class': 'org.apache.cassandra.io.compress.LZ4Compressor' } AND 
	default_time_to_live = 0 AND 
	speculative_retry = '99PERCENTILE' AND 
	min_index_interval = 128 AND 
	max_index_interval = 2048 AND 
	crc_check_chance = 1;

CREATE TABLE system.views_builds_in_progress (
	generation_number int,
	keyspace_name text,
	last_token text,
	view_name text,
	PRIMARY KEY(keyspace_name, view_name)
) WITH 	dclocal_read_repair_chance = 0 AND 
	gc_grace_seconds = 0 AND 
	bloom_filter_fp_chance = 0.01 AND 
	caching = { 'keys': 'ALL', 'rows_per_partition': 'NONE' } AND 
	comment = 'views builds current progress' AND 
	compaction = { 'class': 'org.apache.cassandra.db.compaction.SizeTieredCompactionStrategy', 'max_threshold': '32', 'min_threshold': '4' } AND 
	compression = { 'chunk_length_in_kb': '64', 'class': 'org.apache.cassandra.io.compress.LZ4Compressor' } AND 
	default_time_to_live = 0 AND 
	speculative_retry = '99PERCENTILE' AND 
	min_index_interval = 128 AND 
	max_index_interval = 2048 AND 
	crc_check_chance = 1;


/*
################################################
############# MATERIALIZED VIEWS ###############
################################################
*/

-- modify keyspace name
-- CREATE KEYSPACE book_store
-- 	WITH REPLICATION = {
-- 		'class': 'SimpleStrategy',
-- 		'replication_factor': 1
-- 	}
-- 	AND DURABLE_WRITES = true;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS books (
	id int,
	name text,
	price text,
	width float,
	height float,
	page int,
	cover text,
	publishing_company text,
	SKU int,
	PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

-- change column name
ALTER TABLE book_store.books DROP "price";

-- change column name and type
ALTER TABLE book_store.books ADD price float;

-- change column name and type
ALTER TABLE book_store.books ADD price FLOAT;
DROP TABLE book_store.books;

CREATE TABLE book_store.books (
	cover text,
	height float,
	id int,
	name text,
	page int,
	price float,
	publishing_company text,
	sku int,
	width float,
	PRIMARY KEY(id)
)

INSERT INTO book_store.books(
	id, 
	cover, 
	height, 
	name, 
	page, 
	price, 
	publishing_company, 
	sku, 
	width
)
VALUES(
	1, 
	'Bìa gập', 
	20.5, 
	'Muôn Kiếp Nhân Sinh (Many Lives - Many Times)', 
	408, 
	109.200, 
	'Nhà Xuất Bản Tổng hợp TP.HCM', 
	5075886035946, 
	14.5
);
DROP TABLE book_store.books;

CREATE TABLE book_store.books (
	cover text,
	height float,
	id int,
	name text,
	page int,
	price float,
	publishing_company text,
	sku long,
	width float,
	PRIMARY KEY(id)
)

CREATE TABLE book_store.books (
	cover text,
	height float,
	id int,
	name text,
	page int,
	price float,
	publishing_company text,
	sku bigint,
	width float,
	PRIMARY KEY(id)
)

INSERT INTO book_store.books(
	id, 
	cover, 
	height, 
	name, 
	page, 
	price, 
	publishing_company, 
	sku, 
	width
)
VALUES(
	1, 
	'Bìa gập', 
	20.5, 
	'Muôn Kiếp Nhân Sinh (Many Lives - Many Times)', 
	408, 
	109.200, 
	'Nhà Xuất Bản Tổng hợp TP.HCM', 
	5075886035946, 
	14.5
);

CREATE TABLE book_store.books_clone (
	cover text,
	height float,
	id int,
	name text,
	page int,
	price float,
	publishing_company text,
	sku bigint,
	width float,
	PRIMARY KEY(id)
) WITH 	dclocal_read_repair_chance = 0.1 AND 
	gc_grace_seconds = 864000 AND 
	bloom_filter_fp_chance = 0.01 AND 
	caching = { 'keys': 'ALL', 'rows_per_partition': 'NONE' } AND 
	comment = '' AND 
	compaction = { 'class': 'org.apache.cassandra.db.compaction.SizeTieredCompactionStrategy', 'max_threshold': '32', 'min_threshold': '4' } AND 
	compression = { 'chunk_length_in_kb': '64', 'class': 'org.apache.cassandra.io.compress.LZ4Compressor' } AND 
	default_time_to_live = 0 AND 
	speculative_retry = '99PERCENTILE' AND 
	min_index_interval = 128 AND 
	max_index_interval = 2048 AND 
	crc_check_chance = 1;
DROP TABLE book_store.books_clone;
create keyspace javasampleapproach with replication={'class':'SimpleStrategy', 'replication_factor':1};
CREATE INDEX ON javasampleapproach.customer (firstname);
create keyspace javasampleapproach with replication={'class':'SimpleStrategy', 'replication_factor':1};
DROP KEYSPACE javasampleapproach;
DROP TABLE book_store.books;

-- change keyspace name
CREATE KEYSPACE book_store
	WITH REPLICATION = {
		'class': 'org.apache.cassandra.locator.SimpleStrategy',
		'replication_factor': '1'
	}
	AND DURABLE_WRITES = true;

/*
################################################
################### TYPES ######################
################################################
*/

/*

	cover text,
	height float,
	id int,
	name text,
	page int,
	price float,
	publishing_company text,
	sku bigint,
	width float,
	PRIMARY KEY(id)
) WITH 	dclocal_read_repair_chance = 0.1 AND 
	gc_grace_seconds = 864000 AND 
	bloom_filter_fp_chance = 0.01 AND 
	caching = { 'keys': 'ALL', 'rows_per_partition': 'NONE' } AND 
	comment = '' AND 
	compaction = { 'class': 'org.apache.cassandra.db.compaction.SizeTieredCompactionStrategy', 'max_threshold': '32', 'min_threshold': '4' } AND 
	compression = { 'chunk_length_in_kb': '64', 'class': 'org.apache.cassandra.io.compress.LZ4Compressor' } AND 
	default_time_to_live = 0 AND 
	speculative_retry = '99PERCENTILE' AND 
	min_index_interval = 128 AND 
	max_index_interval = 2048 AND 
	crc_check_chance = 1;

-- change column name and type
ALTER TABLE book_store.books ADD id timeuuid;
DROP TABLE book_store.books;

-- change keyspace name
CREATE KEYSPACE book_store
	WITH REPLICATION = {
		'class': 'org.apache.cassandra.locator.SimpleStrategy',
		'replication_factor': '1'
	}
	AND DURABLE_WRITES = true;

	id timeuuid,
	name text,
	page int,
	price float,
	publishing_company text,
	sku bigint,
	width float,

) WITH 	dclocal_read_repair_chance = 0.1 AND 
	gc_grace_seconds = 864000 AND 
	bloom_filter_fp_chance = 0.01 AND 
	caching = { 'keys': 'ALL', 'rows_per_partition': 'NONE' } AND 
	comment = '' AND 
	compaction = { 'class': 'org.apache.cassandra.db.compaction.SizeTieredCompactionStrategy', 'max_threshold': '32', 'min_threshold': '4' } AND 
	compression = { 'chunk_length_in_kb': '64', 'class': 'org.apache.cassandra.io.compress.LZ4Compressor' } AND 
	default_time_to_live = 0 AND 
	speculative_retry = '99PERCENTILE' AND 
	min_index_interval = 128 AND 
	max_index_interval = 2048 AND 
	crc_check_chance = 1;

create keyspace testrestfullapi with replication={'class':'SimpleStrategy', 'replication_factor':1};

-- change table name and structure
CREATE TABLE testrestfullapi.customer(
   id timeuuid PRIMARY KEY,
   name text,
   age int,
   active boolean
);

INSERT INTO testrestfullapi.customer(
	id, 
	active, 
	age, 
	name
)
VALUES(
	3c592400-0f4f-11eb-8009-49e39b311789, 
	false, 
	15, 
	'huynh tan loi'
);

-- change table name and structure
CREATE TABLE book_store.customer(
	active boolean,
	age int,
	id timeuuid,
	name text,
	PRIMARY KEY(id)
);
DROP KEYSPACE testrestfullapi;

-- change column name and type
ALTER TABLE book_store.books ADD img TEXT;

CREATE TABLE book_store.book (
	cover text,
	description text,
	height float,
	id timeuuid,
	img text,
	name text,
	page int,
	price float,
	publishing_company text,
	sku bigint,
	width float,
	PRIMARY KEY(id)
) WITH 	dclocal_read_repair_chance = 0.1 AND 
	gc_grace_seconds = 864000 AND 
	bloom_filter_fp_chance = 0.01 AND 
	caching = { 'keys': 'ALL', 'rows_per_partition': 'NONE' } AND 
	comment = '' AND 
	compaction = { 'class': 'org.apache.cassandra.db.compaction.SizeTieredCompactionStrategy', 'max_threshold': '32', 'min_threshold': '4' } AND 
	compression = { 'chunk_length_in_kb': '64', 'class': 'org.apache.cassandra.io.compress.LZ4Compressor' } AND 
	default_time_to_live = 0 AND 
	speculative_retry = '99PERCENTILE' AND 
	min_index_interval = 128 AND 
	max_index_interval = 2048 AND 
	crc_check_chance = 1;

CREATE TABLE book_store.customer (
	active boolean,
	age int,
	id timeuuid,
	name text,
	PRIMARY KEY(id)
) WITH 	dclocal_read_repair_chance = 0.1 AND 
	gc_grace_seconds = 864000 AND 
	bloom_filter_fp_chance = 0.01 AND 
	caching = { 'keys': 'ALL', 'rows_per_partition': 'NONE' } AND 
	comment = '' AND 
	compaction = { 'class': 'org.apache.cassandra.db.compaction.SizeTieredCompactionStrategy', 'max_threshold': '32', 'min_threshold': '4' } AND 
	compression = { 'chunk_length_in_kb': '64', 'class': 'org.apache.cassandra.io.compress.LZ4Compressor' } AND 
	default_time_to_live = 0 AND 
	speculative_retry = '99PERCENTILE' AND 
	min_index_interval = 128 AND 
	max_index_interval = 2048 AND 
	crc_check_chance = 1;

INSERT INTO book_store.book(
	id, 
	cover, 
	description, 
	height, 
	img, 
	name, 
	page, 
	price, 
	publishing_company, 
	sku, 
	width
)
VALUES(
	14de58a0-0f6d-11eb-b866-adc08599b503, 
	'bìa gập', 
	'Muôn kiếp nhân sinh là tác phẩm do Giáo sư John Vũ - Nguyên Phong viết từ năm 2017 và hoàn tất đầu năm 2020 ghi lại những câu chuyện, trải nghiệm tiền kiếp kỳ lạ từ nhiều kiếp sống của người bạn tâm giao lâu năm, ông Thomas – một nhà kinh doanh tài chính nổi tiếng ở New York. Những câu chuyện chưa từng tiết lộ này sẽ giúp mọi người trên thế giới chiêm nghiệm, khám phá các quy luật về luật Nhân quả và Luân hồi của vũ trụ giữa lúc trái đất đang gặp nhiều tai ương, biến động, khủng hoảng từng ngày', 
	20.5, 
	'assets/fjfjfjf', 
	'Muôn Kiếp Nhân Sinh (Many Lives - Many Times)', 
	408, 
	109200, 
	'Nhà Xuất Bản Tổng hợp TP.HCM', 
	5075886035946, 
	14.5
);
DROP TABLE book_store.book;
